text: [Music]
I think the world is watching they think
this is uh a very exciting moment is
America going to renew
itself um and you know the fact that
Obama's election means so much
symbolically to people all over the
world um I think that there is a chance
you know that will raise expectations
elsewhere you know we call it the power
of a good
example um when you see
something like you see a breakthrough
like this in a country that as
conservative as the United States and
then you look at your own country and
you say well why can't I have some of
that here right um and likewise the
people are looking at the tools that are
are being used like the social
networking tools uh that you know put to
very good use in his campaign and there
the you know the the possibilities are
opening up right and it doesn't take
that many people all having a similar
idea at the same time now to coales in
some new ways so I expect we will begin
to see uh uh you know like a ripple
effect uh in other parts of the world
absolutely
